title: Apache Pulsar Reference Guide for Quarkus
summary: This documentation explains how Quarkus integrates with Apache Pulsar using SmallRye Reactive Messaging. It covers the basics of Apache Pulsar including producers, consumers, and brokers, alongside in-depth details on how to configure the SmallRye Pulsar connector. The guide also discusses different messaging patterns, serialization, schema management, and transactional messaging to ensure exactly-once delivery. Additionally, it provides instructions on adding the `quarkus-messaging-pulsar` extension and configurations necessary to customize behaviors for production settings.
